[[Image:Med 3.png]] [[1999 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|1999]], [[2004 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|2004]], [[2008 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|2008]],[[2010 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship|2010]], |h_pattern_b=_thinsidesonwhite|h_body=E30A17|h_shorts=E30A17|h_pattern_s=_blanksides2 |a_pattern_b=_thinwhitesides|a_body=E30A17|a_shorts=E30A17|a_pattern_s=_whitesides }} The '''Turkish Under 17 and Under 16 national basketball team''' is the representative for [[Turkey]] in international [[basketball]] competitions, and it is organized and run by the [[Turkish Basketball Federation]]. The '''Turkish Under 16 national basketball team''' represents Turkey at the [[FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship]] and the '''Turkish Under 17 national basketball team''' at the [[FIBA Under-17 World Championship]]. ==FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !width="100"|Position |- |{{flagicon|Italy}} [[1971 FIBA Europe Under-16
